title: Kaiwa mo Shinai Tsurekko no Imouto ga, Naganen Issho ni Baka Yatte-kita Netoge no Friend Datta (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Romance   School Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   Chat Rooms   Cohabitation   Cute Story   Family   First Love   Gamers   Hikikomori   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Siblings Not Related by Blood
author: Hibari Yu   雲雀湯
description:
That day, the beautiful girl who appeared in the meeting with him (online gaming friend of few years), was the stepchild of his father and his new wife.

“I… I’m Philia …”

You’re kidding me, aren’t you ……?

It has been 5 years since our parents remarried but she has always been lacking motivation to do anything at all. Whenever, I see her at home, she always looked unkempt and unattractive. She doesn’t find any motivation to look presentable while staying at home.

But even so, for a moment, I questioned myself whether she was the same stepsister who looked so unrealistically beautiful, now that she was standing Infront of me.

My perplexed attitude was the result of the abrupt change in her which completely ruined our face to face meet up.

Moreover, since we live under the same roof, I presume that my life will drastically change, now that my stepsister has been reborn as a beautiful maiden (in my mind).

Naturally, the changes in our lives which have taken place extends its influence in the school, we both attend. This even involves my childhood friend, who is presently a literal school idol and also is active as a model.

This is a story about my stepsister and I becoming close to each other and who in turn opens to me.>
